//tahseen anwar tahir

import java.util.Scanner;


public class q1 {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner input = new Scanner (System.in);
		int a1 = input.nextInt();
		if (a1%2==0)
		{
			System.out.println("even");
		}
		else
			System.out.println("odd");

	}

}
